title: Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar              August 25, 2016  Huna Tribal House Dedication            Discover how you can get the most out of your Glacier Bay visit:             Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 6 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve Evening Ranger Program      Time: 7:00 PM to 7:45 PM Location: Glacier Bay Lodge Fees: Free     Friday, August 12, 2016 Everyday  from 05/27/2016 to 09/05/2016 Join a ranger for an evening program. View Details      Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve Glacier Bay Ranger "Spotlight" Talk      Time: 5:00 PM to 5:15 PM Location: Bartlett Cove Fees: free     Friday, August 12, 2016 Everyday  from 05/27/2016 to 09/05/2016 Join a park ranger for a short "spotlight" talk. A hidden story of Glacier Bay will be revealed! View Details      Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve Glacier Bay Tour Boat      Time: 7:30 AM to 3:30 PM Location: Bartlett Cove Fees: Passenger Fee     Friday, August 12, 2016 Everyday  from 05/27/2016 to 09/05/2016 Take an all-day tour boat through Glacier Bay and experience the ice ages with a park ranger! View Details      Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve Guided Walk Along the Forest Loop Trail      Time: 1:30 PM to 3:00 PM Location: Bartlett Cove Fees: Free     Friday, August 12, 2016 Everyday  from 05/27/2016 to 09/05/2016 Join a park ranger for a fun and informative walk along the Forest Loop Trail. View Details      Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve Huna Tribal House Grand Opening      Time: 9:30 AM to 7:00 PM Location: Bartlett Cove Fees: free     Thursday, August 25, 2016 Celebrate the completion of the Huna Tribal House in Glacier Bay. This long-awaited day will highlight the Huna Tlingit and their re-connection to Glacier Bay homeland. It is also the 100th anniversary of the National Park Service. View Details      Glacier Bay National Park & Preserve Huna Tribal House OPEN HOUSE      Time: 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM Location: Bartlett Cove Fees: free     Saturday, August 27, 2016 View the beautiful interior carvings of the Huna Tribal House at your leisure. View Details              There is a lot to do and see in Glacier Bay! NPS
